attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's all in the title... but I bet this isn't published anyway.

rejection.details:
There are already 4 'resign' petitions, almost identical to your own, the most popular currently being this one:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Resign/
If you wish to start your own, please resubmit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
